ItemsControlAutomationPeer Class

Definition

Exposes ItemsControl types to UI Automation.

In this Article

public abstract class ItemsControlAutomationPeer : System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider

Constructors

ItemsControlAutomationPeer(ItemsControl)

Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.

protected ItemsControlAutomationPeer (System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl owner);
Parameters
owner
ItemsControl

The ItemsControl that is associated with this ItemsControlAutomationPeer.

Properties

IsVirtualized

Gets a value that indicates whether the ItemsControlAutomationPeer should return AutomationPeer objects for child items that are not virtualized.

protected virtual bool IsVirtualized { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the ItemsControlAutomationPeer should return AutomationPeer objects for child items that are not virtualized; false if the ItemsControlAutomationPeer should return AutomationPeer objects all child items.

Methods

CreateItemAutomationPeer(Object)

When overridden in a derived class, creates a new instance of the ItemAutomationPeer for a data item in the stem.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items* collection of this ItemsControl.

protected abstract System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer CreateItemAutomationPeer (object item);
Parameters
item
Object

The data item that is associated with this ItemAutomationPeer.

Returns
ItemAutomationPeer

The new ItemAutomationPeer created.

FindOrCreateItemAutomationPeer(Object)

Returns an ItemAutomationPeer for the specified object.

protected virtual System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer FindOrCreateItemAutomationPeer (object item);
Parameters
item
Object

The item to get an ItemAutomationPeer for.

Returns
ItemAutomationPeer

An ItemAutomationPeer for the specified object.

Attributes
SecurityCriticalAttribute SecurityTreatAsSafeAttribute

GetChildrenCore()

Gets the collection of child elements of the ItemsControl that is associated with this ItemsControlAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*.

protected override System.Collections.Generic.List<System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> GetChildrenCore ();
Returns
List<AutomationPeer>

The collection of child elements.

GetPattern(PatternInterface)

Gets the control pattern for the ItemsControl that is associated with this ItemsControlAutomationPeer.

public override object GetPattern (System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface);
Parameters
patternInterface
PatternInterface

One of the enumeration values.

Returns
Object

The ScrollViewerAutomationPeer that is associated with this ItemsControlAutomationPeer.

Explicit Interface Implementations

IItemContainerProvider.FindItemByProperty(IRawElementProviderSimple, Int32, Object)

Retrieves an element by the specified property value.

System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple IItemContainerProvider.FindItemByProperty (System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple startAfter, int propertyId, object value);
Parameters
startAfter
IRawElementProviderSimple

The item in the container after which to begin the search.

propertyId
Int32

The property that contains the value to retrieve.

value
Object

The value to retrieve.

Returns
IRawElementProviderSimple

The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, null if no items match.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the ItemsControlAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IItemContainerProvider interface.
